ValidationRule.description: Street, city and country required to save claim in Draft status; Sector required in order to generate Claim Number
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( RecordType.Name = 'Commercial Claim', RecordType.Name = 'Residential Claim' ), OR( ISBLANK( Account.BillingCountry ), ISBLANK( Account.BillingCity ), ISBLANK (Account.BillingStreet ), ISBLANK(Contact.Id), ISBLANK(TEXT(Sector__c)) ) , $Profile.Name <> 'System Administrator' )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please enter street address, city and country for the related Account, and enter a Contact and Sector
